column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Tweet - Thank you very much for your great review. I'm very proud that we were the site of one of your first dates
column2: and I'm very pleased that you are understanding of our extended wait times during peak hours. If you ever find any food item not 100% to your personal standards
column3: just let your server know and he or she will make things right by you. Thanks again
column4: and we look forward to your next visit.
